conclusion: Analyze acceleration-time graph to determine velocity-time graph.
Graph starts at time 0 with acceleration of 2 m/s².
Object starts moving in positive direction due to positive initial acceleration.
Velocity is the integral of acceleration over time.
Acceleration is constant at 2 m/s² from 0 to 2 seconds.
Velocity at maximum is integral of acceleration from 0 to 2 seconds, resulting in 4 m/s.
Velocity is at maximum at 2 seconds as it is constant at 4 m/s from 0 to 2 seconds.
Velocity at maximum is consistent with constant acceleration from 0 to 2 seconds.
